meanings.definition: Of or relating to a centaur.
meanings.sent1: The centauric statue in the park was majestic.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted a centauric creature roaming the forest.
meanings.sent3: The centauric costume at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were centauric, graceful yet powerful.
meanings.sent5: The centauric landscape in the fantasy novel was enchanting.

meanings.definition: Resembling a centaur in form or character.
meanings.sent1: The athlete had a centauric physique, with strong legs and a muscular upper body.
meanings.sent2: The new student had a centauric personality, both gentle and wild.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a centauric shape, half round and half rectangular.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a centauric quality, deep and resonant.
meanings.sent5: The old tree had a centauric appearance, with branches twisting like limbs.
